title: Passive Voice ve Akademik Kullanımı - Ünite Testi

questions.question: The ancient ruins ---- by archaeologists for over fifty years.
questions.explanation: Present Perfect Passive yapısı gerekir. Ruins (kalıntılar) çalışılan şeydir, çalışan değil. 'have been studied' doğru kullanımdır.

questions.question: It ---- that bilingualism enhances cognitive development in children.
questions.explanation: 'It is widely believed that...' akademik metinlerde sık kullanılan passive yapıdır. Genel bir inanç ifade eder.

questions.question: The new policy ---- next month to address environmental concerns.
questions.explanation: Future Passive yapı gerekir. Policy (politika) uygulanan şeydir. 'will be implemented' doğrudur.

questions.question: The manuscript ---- in a vault until it was discovered last year.
questions.explanation: Geçmişte başlayıp, başka bir geçmiş olaydan (discovered) önce devam eden durum için Past Perfect Passive kullanılır.

questions.question: Several factors must ---- when evaluating the effectiveness of the program.
questions.explanation: Modal + Passive yapı: 'must be considered'. Factors (faktörler) değerlendirilen şeydir.

questions.question: The results ---- at the conference before they were published in a journal.
questions.explanation: Simple Past Passive yeterlidir. İki geçmiş olay arasında öncelik vurgusu yoksa 'were presented' kullanılır.

questions.question: It ---- that early childhood education significantly impacts academic success.
questions.explanation: 'It has been demonstrated that...' araştırma sonuçlarını bildirirken kullanılan akademik passive yapıdır.

questions.question: The samples ---- in a controlled environment to prevent contamination.
questions.explanation: Modal passive yapı: 'should be stored'. Samples (örnekler) saklanan şeydir.

questions.question: New regulations ---- to combat climate change by most governments worldwide.
questions.explanation: Present Continuous Passive: 'are being implemented'. Şu anda devam eden bir süreç.

questions.question: The theory ---- by numerous studies over the past two decades.
questions.explanation: 'over the past two decades' Present Perfect gerektirir. Theory (teori) doğrulanan şeydir: 'has been validated'.

questions.question: It can ---- from the data that there is a strong correlation between the variables.
questions.explanation: Modal passive: 'can be concluded'. 'It can be concluded that...' yapısı akademik metinlerde sonuç bildirirken kullanılır.

questions.question: The building ---- down next week to make way for a new shopping center.
questions.explanation: Future Passive: 'will be pulled down'. Building (bina) yıkılan şeydir.

questions.question: Considerable progress ---- in the field of renewable energy in recent years.
questions.explanation: 'in recent years' Present Perfect gerektirir. 'Progress is made' (passive) kullanımı doğrudur.

questions.question: The proposal ---- by the committee before a final decision is reached.
questions.explanation: Modal passive: 'must be reviewed'. Proposal (teklif) incelenen şeydir.

questions.question: It ---- that the new treatment is more effective than traditional methods.
questions.explanation: 'It is expected that...' yapısı beklentileri ifade eden akademik passive yapıdır.

questions.question: All participants ---- to sign a consent form before joining the study.
questions.explanation: Passive yapı gerekir: 'were required'. Katılımcılar imza atmaya zorunlu tutulan kişilerdir.

questions.question: The laboratory equipment ---- regularly to ensure accurate measurements.
questions.explanation: Modal passive: 'must be calibrated'. Ekipman kalibre edilen şeydir.

questions.question: The findings ---- by several independent researchers before publication.
questions.explanation: Yayından önce tamamlanan eylem için Past Perfect Passive: 'had been verified'.

questions.question: It ---- that exercise and healthy diet contribute to longevity.
questions.explanation: 'It is well established that...' bilinen gerçekleri bildiren akademik passive yapıdır.

questions.question: The data ---- using sophisticated statistical software.
questions.explanation: Simple Past Passive: 'were analyzed'. Data (veriler) analiz edilen şeydir.
